name: Match Triple 3D
description:
Not like classic tile puzzle & mahjong games, Match Triple 3D not only connect your brain to logical thinking but also is a free & fun matching puzzle game which is easy for everyone to play.

You just blow your mind to find and match identical 3D objects to make them pop among a tangled mess. When all 3D objects on the ground are collected before the time is over, you can pass the current level! Match Triple 3D can help you to strengthen your memory and boost your engagement. Let’s try and become a master!

Features:

A huge amount of candy crush, cute animals, cool toys, exciting emoji’s, appetizing food, yummy fruits and etc..

Catchy sounds and vivid 3D visual effects

Pause it whenever you want

well-designed trainer to power your brain up


Join and challenge how far you can go in Match Triple 3D - Tile Master & Tile Connect. Matching Triple 3D - Classic Link Free is the best match 3 brain game for adults and kids. If you ever love Onnect Pair, Onet 3D Puzzle or similar ones, you will love this.
